page.title: 05PUBLIC HOUSES IN CHELMARSH
page.content: There are 4 pubs in our area.They are the Bull's Head, King's Arms, The Lion and the Unicorn.There is also the Working Men's Club which is like a pub because they have got a bar and they sell drinks to members.They have also got two snooker tables and one pool table.All the pubs sell snacks and the King's Arms has got a restaurant.All of the pubs have got gambling machines.In the Bull's Head there is a skittle alley where you have to knock down up to 9 wooden skittles with a large wooden ball.
